oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Packages updates in GitHub Enterprise (August 01, 2017)
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Pages and Git have been updated to handle maliciously constructed ssh:// URLs during submodule cloning. This mitigates the vulnerability detailed in CVE-2017-100117 which could have allowed an authenticated attacker to run arbitrary commands on a GitHub Enterprise environment through Pages builds.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.9.0 and less than 2.9.9
Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.8.0 and less than 2.8.17
Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.7.0 and less than 2.7.21
Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.10.0 and less than 2.10.4
